Message:
“Father, there’s still time...
Please, you have to believe me!”

Even as I begged,
my father refused to listen.
How can I make him
believe me...?
“I can grant that wish of yours.”

“Don’t be afraid.
I’m on your side.
I also lent my power
to your mother before.

I didn’t trust the strange voice
echoing in my head...

But, I was left with no choice
but to make a wish.

“If you’re telling the truth...
then give me the power
to save everyone!”

Something surged into my body,
and an unfamiliar sigil
appeared on my skin.

“That’s the mark
of our contract.
Proof that you have
become my acolyte,
and you have been
granted my power.”

Strength flooded through me...
With this, I can—

“Everyone, believe what
I’m saying and run, now!”

My voice,
now imbued with power,
echoed through the halls.
My father slowly rose
to his feet in response.

As relief washed over me,
Father bowed his head
towards me.
